p.text: It is used to insert an item into particular place of the list in accordance with the index.

p.textAll: The item place corresponds with the item's index. E.g. the first item has index "0", the second - "1", the third - "2", etc. So, to insert a new item as the third item of the list specify "4" into the field "Place to write to the list".

remarks.text: If such index already exists in the list, the new item will replace it and the existing one will get the following index of the list.
